typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		application_number as string,
		art_unit_number as string,
		examiner_name as string,
		office_action_count as long,
		non_final_office_action_count as long,
		final_office_action_count as long,
		continued_examination_request_count as long,
		approximate_interview_count as long,
		appeals_count as long,
		days_to_first_office_action as double,
		days_to_first_notice_of_allowance as double,
		filing_date as timestamp,
		status as string,
		status_date as timestamp,
		grant_date as timestamp,
		artunit_apps_count as double,
		artunit_avg_oa as decimal(6,5),
		artunit_allowance_rate as decimal(7,5),
		artunit_avg_days_to_first_oa as decimal(9,5),
		artunit_avg_days_to_first_noa as decimal(9,5),
		examiner_apps_count as double,
		examiner_avg_oa as decimal(6,5),
		examiner_allowance_rate as decimal(7,5),
		examiner_avg_days_to_first_oa as decimal(9,5),
		examiner_avg_days_to_first_noa as decimal(9,5),
		initial_claim_score as double,
		final_claim_score as double,
		final_status as string,
		final_publication_dt as timestamp,
		claim_score_delta as double,
		claim_score_slope_oa as double,
		claim_score_slope_days as double,
		patented as long,
		days_to_grant as double,
		priority as double,
		priority_office_count as double,
		priority_office as string[],
		au_avg_claim_score as double,
		au_avg_claim_score_delta as double,
		au_avg_claim_score_slope_oa as double,
		au_avg_claim_score_slope_days as double,
		examiner_avg_claim_score as double,
		examiner_avg_claim_score_delta as double,
		examiner_avg_claim_score_slope_oa as double,
		examiner_avg_claim_score_slope_days as double,
		au_avg_days_to_grant as double,
		examiner_avg_days_to_grant as double,
		{__index_level_0__} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	container: 'prosecution',
	fileName: 'training_data_post2010.parquet') ~> source1
source1 derive(RowKey = application_number,
		PartitionKey = left(application_number,5)) ~> issuancefeatures
issuancefeatures sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'prosecution',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	partitionFileNames:['table_upload.csv'],
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		application_number,
		art_unit_number,
		examiner_name,
		office_action_count,
		non_final_office_action_count,
		final_office_action_count,
		continued_examination_request_count,
		approximate_interview_count,
		appeals_count,
		days_to_first_office_action,
		days_to_first_notice_of_allowance,
		filing_date,
		status,
		status_date,
		grant_date,
		artunit_apps_count,
		artunit_avg_oa,
		artunit_allowance_rate,
		artunit_avg_days_to_first_oa,
		artunit_avg_days_to_first_noa,
		examiner_apps_count,
		examiner_avg_oa,
		examiner_allowance_rate,
		examiner_avg_days_to_first_oa,
		examiner_avg_days_to_first_noa,
		initial_claim_score,
		final_claim_score,
		final_status,
		final_publication_dt,
		claim_score_delta,
		claim_score_slope_oa,
		claim_score_slope_days,
		patented,
		days_to_grant,
		priority,
		priority_office_count,
		au_avg_claim_score,
		au_avg_claim_score_delta,
		au_avg_claim_score_slope_oa,
		au_avg_claim_score_slope_days,
		examiner_avg_claim_score,
		examiner_avg_claim_score_delta,
		examiner_avg_claim_score_slope_oa,
		examiner_avg_claim_score_slope_days,
		au_avg_days_to_grant,
		examiner_avg_days_to_grant,
		RowKey,
		PartitionKey
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
